requirements: Master's degree in Computer Science or related field
Proven experience in developing and maintaining high-performance backend systems, APIs, and databases
Expertise in cloud infrastructure (AWS) and optimization (Terraform)
Strong understanding of database performance optimization and indexing strategies
Experience in designing and implementing robust APIs to handle large data volumes
Proficiency in integrating electronic healthcare management software
Demonstrated ability to collaborate with cross-functional and geographically dispersed teams
Experience in implementing machine learning algorithms for predictive analytics
Experience with code reviews and improving code quality
